sentences.en: A preliminary trial is carried out in 4 wells in Tarim oilfield.
sentences.cn: 这种堵漏剂具有一定的油溶性和酸溶性,堵漏效果好,对油层污染小.

sentences.en: Barium is found in some oilfield brines in concentrations greater than 100 mg / litre.
sentences.cn: 在有些油田卤水中,钡的浓度大于100毫克/升.

sentences.en: Combined with the theoretical research, Putaohua oilfield pilot test is proved successful.
sentences.cn: 结合理论研究在葡萄花油田现场试验,取得较好效果.

sentences.en: Constructing a harmonious oilfield is inevitable for oilfield enterprises to develop.
sentences.cn: 摘要构建和谐油田是油田企业不断发展壮大的必然要求.

sentences.en: Drilling will continue on the site to assess the dimensions of the new oilfield.
sentences.cn: 该处的钻探工作将继续下去，以便估测新油田的面积。

sentences.en: Highly - displacement drilling is an effective technology to exploit peripheral oilfield.
sentences.cn: 摘要大位移钻井是开发边际油田的有效手段.

sentences.en: Logging tool sticking often occurs during drilling operation in Zhongyuan oilfield.
sentences.cn: 在中原油田,测井阻卡是钻井施工中常遇到的现象之一.

sentences.en: One partial solution to our energy problems lies not in the oilfield but in the cornfield, as nations increasingly replace some petroleum needs with bioenergy — fuel made from plants.
sentences.cn: 解决能源危机的新出路不在油田，而可能在农田；世界各国正在用生物能源——从植物中提取的燃料——取代对部分石油制品的需求。

sentences.en: Pingbei Area of Ansai Oilfield belongs to low permeability sandstone reservoir.
sentences.cn: 安塞油田坪北区属于低渗透砂岩油藏.

sentences.en: Scientific output prediction is very important for the development in oilfield.
sentences.cn: 科学的产量预测对油田开发具有重要的意义.

sentences.en: Study on Construction of Corporation Culture of Daqing Oilfield Company Limited.
sentences.cn: 钻井企业技术创新评价模型研究.

sentences.en: Systems engineering has been widely applied in the oilfield exploitation and construction.
sentences.cn: 近年来，系统工程学在油田开发建设中应用广泛。

sentences.en: The casing damage was serious during the thermal production Liaohe Oilfield.
sentences.cn: 辽河油田稠油热采过程中套管损坏严重.

sentences.en: The Daqing Oilfield is one of the richest oilfields in our country.
sentences.cn: 大庆油田是我国最富的油田之一.

sentences.en: The injection technic develops gradually with the deeper exploitation to oilfield.
sentences.cn: 注水技术是随着油田的深度开采而逐步发展起来的.

sentences.en: This paper introduces three kinds of bacteria which are the most hazardous for oilfield water injection, namely sulfate reducing bacteria, iron bacteria and saprophytic bacteria.
sentences.cn: 摘要油田注入水中硫酸盐还原菌、铁细菌、腐生菌是危害最大的细菌，这三种细菌特性各异，相互之间还存在一定的联系。

sentences.en: Water injection system is one of the five systems in oilfield.
sentences.cn: 油田注水系统是油田地面工程的五大系统之一.

sentences.en: Yangjiaba oilfield product oil in 1988 is a old oilfield now.
sentences.cn: 杨家坝油田是1988年投入开发的老油田.

trans.tran_en: an area of land or sea under which there is oil
